title: Eeek. Last week when we set out to ship early, we hit a bit of trouble!  Some acceptance tests were ...

attachments.displayName:
Eeek. Last week when we set out to ship early, we hit a bit of trouble!  Some acceptance tests were taking 15 to 30 seconds when they should have been milliseconds, and the entire build was failing consistently...

Maybe that's what you get for trying to get ahead of the process, but either way it's fixed now and we have a couple more days of polish before widening the pre-alpha feedback group!

object.content:
Eeek. Last week when we set out to ship early, we hit a bit of trouble!  Some acceptance tests were taking 15 to 30 seconds when they should have been milliseconds, and the entire build was failing consistently...

Maybe that's what you get for trying to get ahead of the process, but either way it's fixed now and we have a couple more days of polish before widening the pre-alpha feedback group!
